attributes.review: This app is horrible I got several death threats while using this app I also got booted off-line from everything in my house because I said bill Nye the science guy would be a better president than Trump so don’t get this app and if you do read it one star
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review:
So it was a normal sunny day, I had just finished taking my goldfish for a walk. I put him back in his cage so I could eat a snack, after I was done with my snack saw that my goldfish drowned I don’t know how it happened I suspect my sister. She never liked that goldfish ima have to interrogate her.

Oh my goldfish’s name was auzzie
attributes.title: My goldfish drowned 😔😣😣

attributes.review: I can’t believe how terrible this app is it’s so. Bad my brain cell instantly die would rate -1000 stars if I could but unfortunately the minimum is 1 took to long to download and had too much politics did not enjoy playing this game at all would not recommend
attributes.title: Garbage app

attributes.review: Not to sound unprofessional, but I was really excited to download this app! But, the app started lagging really bad to the point where it glitched me out every few seconds. Even after I deleted it, my phone kept glitching just because of this app. I’m very dissapointed.
attributes.title: i hate it

attributes.review: this app is horrible and i would’ve gave this 0 stars if it was possible. ever since i got this app, i realized that it crashes so much i can’t even use the app anymore. it lags consistency and everything takes so long to load. it also wiped my photos off of my phone and screwed up the settings too. new features are always added in updates but the bugs are never fixed. please fix these bugs and glitches immediately.
attributes.title: too many glitches

attributes.review: This app was absolutely horrible! There were many technical difficulties and the app kept crashing. My phone is now acting weird and I’m pretty sure it has a virus.. would definitely NOT recommend!!
attributes.title: Horrible and too many technical difficulties

attributes.review: I wish I could give zero!😭😳I loved DJ Trump, but after downloading this awful app, the Pope may be the only man to trust! When I logged into my account my phone was frozen on a screen with a photograph of Trump and his friend Epstein! Trump was giving him an oil massage while kissing on a pink couch!!! Disgraceful. I hate it! Waste of my time! Shut it down! 😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: SINFUL KISSING AND MASSAGES?!

attributes.review: Asked for permission to call me and when i accepted it started calling me and ordering me to do certain things because am not originally from The us and it deleted alot of my communication apps that i use to call my family and friends back home.
attributes.title: App review

attributes.review:
The app shut down my phone.  I logged on and immediately it hacked all my personal information. It’s slow down my phone and shut off my phone for an hour and a half. Do you not download this app it will hack your phone.  
Especially with orange man looking at you
attributes.title: THIS APP THIS SO BAD

attributes.review: I’ve been into the news and politics recently and wanted to see what this app was about. As soon as I downloaded it (which took 7 hours) It downloaded 32 virius and after that it hacked all my personal data and gave out my credit card info🖕🏽🖕🏽
attributes.title: DONT DOWN LOAD
